entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow this afternoon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning near midnight then changing to snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
